summary: A badass Daedric Greatsword used by Daedric Assassins sent from Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]A badass Daedric Greatsword used by Daedric Assassins sent from Oblivion.

It can be found behind the blacksmithing forge in Windhelm (an image showing the location is included).

[size=2][u][b]Installation Instructions:

[/b][/u]Extract all files to your Skyrim Data directory (merge/replace when prompted),
and launch the game, open Data Files, make sure DaedricAssassinBlade.esp is checked.
[/size]
[u][b]Crafting/Tempering:[/b][/u]
It requires Daedric Smithing perk, 3 ebony ingots, and 2 corundum ingots to craft, and 1 ebony and 1 corundum ingot to temper.

Decent damage, good speed, and looks cool! ;)

[/size]
author: Jaco Janse van Vuuren
